segments.advisor_message: Alright, uh, just to wrap this up, can you tell me about any income you have? Like, um, the name of the source and how much it is?
segments.client_message: Yeah, so I have a salary, right? It's about, um, fifteen hundred a month. I dunno if it’s, like, net or gross, but I think it’s before tax.

segments.advisor_message: Got it, so salary fifteen hundred. Any notes or, um, specifics about that income?
segments.client_message: Um, not really, just that I get it like every month until forever basically, or till I change jobs. So, uh, just monthly salary then.
